layout: Full viewport center layout with gray background (`bg-gray-50`) and card form (`rounded-2xl shadow-xl border border-gray-100`)
Stacked form inputs with `space-y-6`, JetBrains Mono inline typography, and primary button `bg-black text-white rounded-lg`
Inline link to signup page plus error badge text
interactions: Email/password controlled inputs with validation via local `login` store action
Button disabled/loading state with text swap `Signing in...`
Link navigation to `/signup`

layout: Centered column with dot-matrix title, large form card (`card p-8`) and footer text
Inputs for full name, email, password, confirm password using `.input-field` utility
Animated loader `animate-spin` within submit button
interactions: Client-side validation for all fields with inline error text `text-red-500`
Simulated async submit (1500ms) then router push to `/login` with success query
Terms links styled as underline text

layout: Responsive container `container-responsive space-y-8 sm:space-y-12 py-4 sm:py-8`
Heading stack with dot matrix title and JetBrains subtitle
Category grid `grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-4 sm:gap-6 lg:gap-8` of cards containing image, title, helper text
interactions: Each `Link` wraps card with hover background change (`hover:bg-gray-50`) and image zoom `group-hover:scale-105`
Routes to `/category/[slug]` per category

layout: Page title, subtitle centered
Filters block `bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-sm border border-gray-100 p-4 sm:p-6` containing search input, price slider, rating select arranged in responsive grid
Products grid `grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 xl:grid-cols-4 gap-4 sm:gap-6` of cards with image, metadata, price and CTA buttons
interactions: Search filter text input matches name/description
Range slider `type=range` controlling `maxPrice` up to 15000000 (₹150k)
Rating dropdown for thresholds (0,3,4,4.5)
Buttons call `addToCart` or `buyNow` then route to `/cart`

layout: Title block, then either empty state (icon, CTA) or two-column grid (items + summary)
Cart item card uses flex layout with thumbnail, details, quantity controls, remove button
Order summary card with totals
interactions: Quantity buttons call `updateQuantity`; manual input via number field
Remove action `removeFromCart` with trash icon
Proceed link to `/checkout`

layout: Grid of three cards: shipping address form, payment form, order summary
Inputs use shared Input component, grid splits for city/state and postal/country
Summary lists cart items with totals
interactions: Validations: required address fields, card number length, expiry format, CVV digits, or UPI ID contains '@'
Place order button shows loading text and triggers `placeOrder` then redirect to `/orders?placed=ID`
Error message `bg-red-50 text-red-600` for invalid states

layout: Title block with dot-matrix font
Optional success banner `card p-4 bg-green-50 border-green-200` when `placed` query exists
List of order cards containing header (id/date/status badge), progress timeline, line items, footer total
interactions: Progress tracker shows steps `processing → shipped → out_for_delivery → delivered` with animated progress line width
Status badges colored per state (green, blue, yellow, gray, red)
Data bound to Zustand orders array

layout: Title block, metrics grid (4 cards), charts grid (line, bar) plus pie card
Each chart inside `card p-6` with heading and fixed height container
interactions: Charts rendered via `react-chartjs-2` + Chart.js registration for line, bar, pie
Derived datasets: monthly orders, revenue per month, top categories, revenue growth, avg order value
Empty-state placeholders `No data available` when orders array empty

layout: Category-specific grids similar to product page but with brand filter (browse)
Electronics uses curated ID set and CTA button
interactions: Brand dropdown filters by first word of product name
Add to cart button per card

Header.description: Sticky top navigation with store title, nav links (Home, Orders, Analytics, Cart), responsive layout, user avatar, logout button
Header.props_state: Derives `cartCount`, `user`, `logout` from Zustand; uses lucide-react icons
behaviors: Cart badge positioned absolute with `text-[10px] bg-black text-white rounded-full`
Mobile nav uses icon buttons with hover background

AuthWrapper.description: Layout guard verifying authentication, renders Header + page padding or bypass for login/signup
behaviors: Wraps children with `max-w-6xl px-4 py-6` container

Product Card/Grid.description: `.card p-4 sm:p-6 group flex flex-col` containing image, metadata, price, CTA buttons

Category Cards.description: Home page cards with image preview and text center, triggered via `Link` group

Forms/Inputs.description: Reusable `.input-field` class across login, signup, checkout
Forms/Inputs.details: Padding `px-4 py-3`, border `border-gray-200`, focus ring `box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px black`

variants.btn-primary: White background, black border, radius 0, font-size 0.75rem, transition 0.2s, invert on hover

Checkout Form Blocks.description: Two cards for address/payment with grid subsections; Input helper component defined inline at bottom
Checkout Form Blocks.controls: Payment select toggles credit-card fields vs. UPI

Order Timeline.description: Progress indicator with absolute background line and step circles reflecting status; widths animate via inline style `transition-all duration-500`

Cart Item Rows.description: Flex row with image, details, quantity stepper (Minus/Plus), remove button; uses lucide icons

Filter/Search Bar.description: Search text input, price slider, rating select in grid container with label styling

Slider.description: <input type="range"> class `w-full`, min 0 max 15000000 step 100000 controlling currency value

Analytics Cards.description: Four metric cards showing totals with JetBrains text, simple layout

Charts.line: Sales Per Month (orders dataset, blue) with tension 0.4
Charts.bar: Revenue Per Month (green) with border radius 4
Charts.pie: Top Categories (color palette: red, orange, yellow, green, blue, violet)

Loading Skeleton.description: Global loading state `animate-pulse` grid of placeholders

fonts.sans: Geist Sans variable for general text

card_hover.effect: Scale to 1.02 with shadow elevation (`transform: scale(1.02)`, `box-shadow` change)

order_progress.effect: Progress bar width transitions via inline style + `transition-all duration-500`

touch_guard.note: Touch devices disable hover scale via media query in `globals.css`

state.cart: Array of { productId, quantity } persisted via zustand `persist` middleware
state.orders: Array persisted; each order has id, createdAt, items, total, address, status
state.user: Simple mock user with name/email derived from login email

actions.addToCart/buyNow: increment quantity or push new item
actions.placeOrder: build order with orderItems from `mixedCatalog`, compute totals, prepend to orders, clear cart, return id
actions.login: mock success when email/password truthy, sets user/isAuthenticated, returns boolean

cart_logic: Total price computed by summing `product.price * quantity` (prices stored as paise: divide by 100 for INR display)
Order summary displays shipping as Free
filters: Category page uses search string to match product name/description case-insensitively
checkout_logic: Credit card: 16-digit numeric, expiry MM/YY regex, CVV 3 digits
On success, builds order with status `processing`, pushes to store, redirects to orders page
orders_logic: Timeline steps derived from `ORDER_STEPS`, progress width percentage = index/(steps-1)
Status labels map to friendly names
analytics_logic: Sales per month: Map by month label (MMM YYYY) counting orders
Revenue per month: Sum totals per month for bar chart
Top categories: Sum order item totals per category, sorted desc, limited colors array
Revenue growth rate: compare current month vs previous month revenue; fallback 100% if previous 0 and current >0
Avg order value: total revenue / number of orders
Empty state returns dataset skeleton (no labels/data) so Chart.js renders gracefully
auth_flow: AuthWrapper prevents access to non-auth routes until login sets `isAuthenticated` true
Login uses simulated delay, sets error string for invalid credentials (currently always success when fields filled)

public_images: icons: file.svg, globe.svg, next.svg, vercel.svg, window.svg
assets.remote_media: Category/product pages use external image URLs per product definitions in `mixedCatalog`
